General.Name: Shenzhen Capstone Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Capstone Industrial Co.,Ltd. engages in the mobile digital integrated marketing, and online and offline new media businesses in China. The company is also involved in the supply chain and private capital management; industrial cannabis cultivation, extraction, and processing; and Internet media and blockchain businesses. Shenzhen Capstone Industrial Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
